# The `CallGraphUpdater.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides interfaces used to manipulate a call graph, regardless if it is a &quot;old style&quot; CallGraph or an &quot;new style&quot; LazyCallGraph. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file provides interfaces used to manipulate a call graph, regardless if it is a &quot;old style&quot; CallGraph or an &quot;new style&quot; LazyCallGraph.
